about_the_game:
This is the soundtrack for the Ion Fury game created by Voidpoint and published by 3D Realms.

These songs were composed using classic tracker programs such as Fast Tracker II. The soundtrack includes 2 hours and 14 minutes of award-winning music by Jarkko Rotsten.

Mastered by Jykä Ahola @ Dreamhouse Studio, Finland

Downloads provided in 320kbps MP3 and lossless FLAC formats.
